completionPage.title: Test Completed!
completionPage.thankYou: Thank you for participating in the spatial reasoning assessment.
completionPage.successMessage: You have successfully completed all questions in booklet #{{bookletId}}.
completionPage.footer: Your data has been securely saved | Based on the Spatial-DISE dataset | For research purposes | Contact the research team for any questions

welcomePage.title: Spatial-DISE
welcomePage.testPurposeText: To assess your spatial reasoning and visual cognitive abilities.
welcomePage.footer: Your data is secure | Based on the Spatial-DISE Bench | For research purposes
welcomePage.requiredFieldAlert: Please fill in all required fields
welcomePage.startSurveyError: Could not start survey. Please try again.

consentPage.title: Research Participation Informed Consent
consentPage.researchInfoText: Before participating in this spatial cognitive ability research, please carefully read the following documents:
consentPage.participantInfoSheetText: Detailed explanation of research purpose, process, and your rights
consentPage.informedConsentFormText: Formal legal document for consent to participate in research
consentPage.consentCheckboxLabel: I have carefully read and understood the contents of the Participant Information Sheet and Informed Consent Form. I understand the purpose, process, risks, and benefits of the research, and voluntarily agree to participate in this spatial cognitive ability study. I understand that I have the right to withdraw from the study at any time, and that my personal information will be kept confidential.
consentPage.footer: Your data is secure | Based on Spatial-DISE benchmark | For research purposes | Contact the research team if you have questions
consentPage.agreeAlert: Please agree to the informed consent form to participate in the research
consentPage.consentError: An error occurred while saving your consent. Please try again.

app.consentSaveLocal: Network connection is unstable. Your consent has been saved locally. You can continue with the research.
app.consentSaveError: Technical issues occurred while saving consent record, but you can still continue with the research. Your consent has been recorded.
app.loadSurveyError: Failed to load test questions, please refresh the page and try again
